name: Dungeon Knight (itch) (ShibaFlow)
description:
2D TopDown game where you have to complete  & kill enemies as fast as possbile!

WASD - move

Left Mouse - Attack

Assets in this project:

 2D pixel art -  https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

Spell Effect - https://pimen.itch.io/dark-spell-effect
